comment.author: 32241876@N05
comment._content: I think this may be a spot that was known as "The Holy Well", a little past Browns Road that went out in the Avon Dam direction. This is about halfway inbetween Windy Gully and Cordeaux Valley. From what I've been told by the old-timers, it was a popular spot to stop and water the horses. Eventually the well ran dry, perhaps proving it wasn't as holy as people liked to think...

comment.author: 32241876@N05
comment._content: I am sure this is the spot, as it is today: i63.photobucket.com/albums/h147/darianzam/HolyWellCordeau...
